properties.name: agreement.api.basepath
properties.description: TMF API base paths for our agreement management system.

values.description: Agreement management host and base path for localhost.

properties.name: application.title
properties.description: String label representing name of Adlatus application.

properties.name: application.version
properties.description: String value representing a version of Adlatus application.

properties.name: cxf.path
properties.description: At runtime do not use /services, rather redirect all requests with path '/ws' to Apache CXF engine to root level.

properties.name: hub.event-registration-service
properties.description: Hub event registration service. Utilizes in-memory config in case if property is not set.

values.description: Hub Event registration service uses JPA repositories.
Hub event registration service utilizes in-memory configuration.
Hub event registration service utilizes mongodb repositories.
